headline: Q4 Earnings Outperformers: Leggett & Platt (NYSE:LEG) And The Rest Of The Home Furnishings Stocks
summary: Quarterly earnings results are a good time to check in on a company’s progress, especially compared to its peers in the same sector. Today we are looking at Leggett & Platt (NYSE:LEG) and the best and worst performers in the home furnishings industry.
